      • alarmId

        public int alarmId
        The alarm clock id. Mark a unique alarm clock.

        Can only add 8 alarm clocks. So the alarmId must in 0-7. ALARM_ID_MIN ALARM_ID_MAX

      • year

        public int year
        The alarm clock year.

      • month

        The alarm clock month.

      • hour

        The alarm clock hour.

      • minute

        public int minute
        The alarm clock minute.

      • repeat

        public int repeat
        The alarm clock repeat.

        Use isRepeatEnable(int, int) get repeat days.Use setRepeatEnable(int, int, boolean) set repeat days.

        If you changed this repeat value, don't forget save changed with setRepeat(int) method.

      • enable

        public boolean enable
        The alarm clock enable.

    • Method Detail

      • isRepeatEnable

        public static boolean isRepeatEnable(int repeat,
                                     int flag)
        To determine whether a day is set to repeat
        Parameters:
        repeat - The repeat value of alarm clock
        flag - REPEAT_FLAG_MON REPEAT_FLAG_TUE REPEAT_FLAG_WED REPEAT_FLAG_THU REPEAT_FLAG_FRI REPEAT_FLAG_SAT REPEAT_FLAG_SUN
        Returns:
        True is repeat. False not.

      • setRepeatEnable

        public static int setRepeatEnable(int repeat,
                                  int flag,
                                  boolean enable)
        Set one day to repeat or not.
        Parameters:
        repeat - The repeat value of alarm clock
        flag - REPEAT_FLAG_MON REPEAT_FLAG_TUE REPEAT_FLAG_WED REPEAT_FLAG_THU REPEAT_FLAG_FRI REPEAT_FLAG_SAT REPEAT_FLAG_SUN
        enable - True is enable repeat. False not.
        Returns:
        Changed value of repeat
